# This file was generated by Jucer2CMake from jucedll.jucer

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED jucedll_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "jucedll_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(jucedll_jucer_FILE
  "${jucedll_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

if(NOT EXISTS "${jucedll_jucer_FILE}")
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No such file: ${jucedll_jucer_FILE}")
endif()

get_filename_component(jucedll_jucer_DIR
  "${jucedll_jucer_FILE}" DIRECTORY
)


jucer_project_begin(
  PROJECT_FILE "${jucedll_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "IvabE4"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "juce_dll"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  # COMPANY_NAME
  # COMPANY_WEBSITE
  # COMPANY_EMAIL
  PROJECT_TYPE "Static Library"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.rawmaterialsoftware.juce"
  BINARYDATACPP_SIZE_LIMIT "Default"
  # BINARYDATA_NAMESPACE
  PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS "JUCE_DLL_BUILD=1"
)

  juce_audio_basics
  PATH "${jucedll_jucer_DIR}/../../modules"
)

  juce_audio_devices
  PATH "${jucedll_jucer_DIR}/../../modules"
